event.name: OnTableLoaded
event.hint: Triggers after the table first loads

event.name: OnGameStarted
event.hint: Triggers at the start of a new game, such as when the table first loads or after a game reset

event.name: OnPlayerConnected
event.hint: Triggers when a player reconnects to the game

param.name: player
param.hint: The player that reconnected to the game

event.name: OnPlayerQuit
event.hint: Triggers when a player leaves the game

param.name: player
param.hint: The player that left the game

event.name: OnDeckLoaded
event.hint: Triggers when a player loads a deck

param.name: player
param.hint: the player that loaded the deck

param.name: isLimited
param.hint: true if the deck was loaded via the Limited Deck Editor, false if a pre-built deck was loaded

param.name: groups
param.hint: the groups in which cards were loaded into

event.name: OnCounterChanged
event.hint: Triggers when a player's counter changes values

param.name: player
param.hint: the player that owns the affected counter

param.name: counter
param.hint: the affected counter

param.name: value
param.hint: the original value of the counter

param.name: scripted
param.hint: true if the counter's value was changed via python script, false if it was manually changed through the UI

event.name: OnTurnPaused
event.hint: Triggers when the passing of the turn is interrupted due to a stop set by another player

param.name: player
param.hint: the player that interruped the turn passing

event.name: OnTurnPassed
event.hint: Triggers when the turn is passed to another player

param.name: player
param.hint: the original player passing the turn

param.name: turn
param.hint: the turn number before the turn was passed

param.name: force
param.hint: true if turn stops were forced to skip via scripting

event.name: OnCardTargeted
event.hint: Triggers when a target is added or removed from a card

param.name: player
param.hint: the player creating or removing the target

param.name: card
param.hint: the affected card object

param.name: targeted
param.hint: true if the target was created, false if the target was removed

param.name: scripted
param.hint: true if the target was created via python script, false if created through the UI

event.name: OnCardArrowTargeted
event.hint: Triggers when a card arrow target is created or removed between two cards

param.name: player
param.hint: the player that changed the target arrow

param.name: fromCard
param.hint: the card at the base of the target arrow

param.name: toCard
param.hint: the card at the point of the target arrow

param.name: targeted
param.hint: true if the target arrow was created, false if the arrow was removed

param.name: scripted
param.hint: true if the target arrow was created via python script, false if created through the UI

event.name: OnPlayerGlobalVariableChanged
event.hint: Triggers when the value of a player's global variable changes

param.name: player
param.hint: the player owner of the affected global variable

param.name: name
param.hint: the affected global variable's name

param.name: oldValue
param.hint: the original value for this variable

param.name: value
param.hint: the new value for this variable

event.name: OnGlobalVariableChanged
event.hint: Triggers when the value of a global variable changes

param.name: name
param.hint: the affected global variable's name

param.name: oldValue
param.hint: the original value for this variable

param.name: value
param.hint: the new value for this variable

event.name: OnCardClicked
event.hint: Triggers when a card is clicked.

param.name: card
param.hint: the affected card object

param.name: mouseButton
param.hint: the integer associated with the mouse button being clicked. 0 for left, 1 for middle, 2 for right. 3 and 4 are additional mappable mouse buttons

param.name: keysDown
param.hint: an array of keys which were also held while the click occurred

event.name: OnCardDoubleClicked
event.hint: Triggers when a card is double-clicked.

param.name: card
param.hint: the affected card object

param.name: mouseButton
param.hint: the integer associated with the mouse button being double-clicked. 0 for left, 1 for middle, 2 for right. 3 and 4 are additional mappable mouse buttons

param.name: keysDown
param.hint: an array of keys which were also held while the double-click occurred

event.name: OnMarkerChanged
event.hint: Triggers when a marker's quantity is changed on a card

param.name: card
param.hint: the affected card object

param.name: marker
param.hint: the name of the marker being changed

param.name: id
param.hint: the unique identifier of the marker being changed

param.name: value
param.hint: the original quantity of the marker

param.name: scripted
param.hint: true if a script changed the marker, false if the player manually changed the marker through the UI

event.name: OnCardControllerChanged
event.hint: Triggers when the controller of a card changes

param.name: card
param.hint: the affected card object

param.name: oldPlayer
param.hint: the original controller of the card

param.name: player
param.hint: the player taking control of the card

event.name: OnCardsMoved
event.hint: Triggers when one or more cards are moved to a new location via drag-drop.

param.name: player
param.hint: the player executing the card move script

param.name: cards
param.hint: the array of card objects involved in the move

param.name: fromGroups
param.hint: the array of source groups

param.name: toGroups
param.hint: the array of destination groups

param.name: indexs
param.hint: the array of original z-index positions within the source groups

param.name: xs
param.hint: the array of original x-coordinate positions, if the source group is the table

param.name: ys
param.hint: the array of original y-coordinate positions, if the source group is the table

param.name: highlights
param.hint: the array of original highlight color strings on the cards

param.name: markers
param.hint: the array of original markers placed on the cards. Note that these are stored as strings and will need to be parsed back to a dictionary to be read in python.

param.name: faceups
param.hint: the array of original faceup states on the cards

param.name: filters
param.hint: the array of original filter color strings on the cards

param.name: alternates
param.hint: the array of original alternate card states on the cards

event.name: OnScriptedCardsMoved
event.hint: Triggers when a python script causes one or more cards to move to a new location.

param.name: player
param.hint: the player executing the card move script

param.name: cards
param.hint: the array of card objects involved in the move

param.name: fromGroups
param.hint: the array of source groups

param.name: toGroups
param.hint: the array of destination groups

param.name: indexs
param.hint: the array of original z-index positions within the source groups

param.name: xs
param.hint: the array of original x-coordinate positions, if the source group is the table

param.name: ys
param.hint: the array of original y-coordinate positions, if the source group is the table

param.name: highlights
param.hint: the array of original highlight color strings on the cards

param.name: markers
param.hint: the array of original markers placed on the cards. Note that these are stored as strings and will need to be parsed back to a dictionary to be read in python.

param.name: faceups
param.hint: the array of original faceup states on the cards

param.name: filters
param.hint: the array of original filter color strings on the cards

param.name: alternates
param.hint: the array of original alternate card states on the cards

event.name: OnPhasePassed
event.hint: Triggers when the active turn player changes the current phase

param.name: name
param.hint: the name of the previous phase

param.name: id
param.hint: the index of the previous phase in the list of phases

param.name: force
param.hint: true if stops set on a phase were forced to skip via scripting

event.name: OverrideCardsMoved
event.hint: Overrides the default behavior when one or more cards are moved to another location via drag-drop.

param.name: cards
param.hint: the array of card objects involved in the move

param.name: toGroups
param.hint: the array of requested destination groups

param.name: indexs
param.hint: the array of requested z-index positions within the destination group

param.name: xs
param.hint: the array of requested x-coordinate positions, if the destination group is the table

param.name: ys
param.hint: the array of requested y-coordinate positions, if the destination group is the table

param.name: faceups
param.hint: the array of boolean faceup states requested at the destination group

event.name: OverrideTurnPassed
event.hint: Overrides the default behavior when clicking the green 'pass turn' button on the player tab

param.name: player
param.hint: the player the turn is being passed to

event.name: OverrideGameReset
event.hint: Overrides the default behavior when a game reset command is requested

event.name: OverrideGameSoftReset
event.hint: Overrides the default behavior when a soft-reset command is requested

event.name: OverridePhasePassed
event.hint: (unused) Overrides the default behavior when the active phase passes past a stopped phase

param.name: name
param.hint: the name of the paused phase triggering the event

param.name: id
param.hint: the index of the paused phase in the list of phases

event.name: OverridePhaseClicked
event.hint: Overrides the default behavior for clicking on a phase button

param.name: name
param.hint: the name of the phase clicked

param.name: id
param.hint: the index of the phase in the list of phases
